firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of all Minions in play.
name: Exterminator
ability: You start knowing which Minions are in play.
flavor: Don't knock the power of a pest. Persistence and stubbornness can be useful in many situations.

otherNightReminder: Show the hand signal for the number (0, 1, 2, etc.) for the number of players that nominated a player of different alignment today.
name: Messenger
ability: Each night*, you learn how many players nominated a player of different alignment.
flavor: Saying nothing is also saying something.

otherNightReminder: If the Whisper's private statement was true: Choose a player not protected from dying tonight. That player dies.
name: Whisper
ability: Each day, you may make a statement in private to the Storyteller. Tonight, if it was true, a player dies.
flavor: The quietude: therein lie the most profound truths.

name: Street Rat
ability: Once per game, during the day, privately make a wish to the Storyteller. The Storyteller may break game rules and grant it in proportion to the gravity of the wish.
flavor: I can show you the world.

firstNightReminder: Replace the Acolyte's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the 'Is the Acolyte' reminder token (that player is still the good Acolyte). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Demon.
name: Acolyte
ability: The Demon has a not-in-play Minion ability.

otherNightReminder: If the Plague Doctor is dead: Replace the Plague Doctor's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the 'Is the Plague Doctor' reminder token (that player is still the good Plague Doctor). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.

otherNightReminder: The previously drunk player is no longer drunk. If the Pagan is marked with the 'Died by execution' reminder: You may decide to make 1 player drunk or kill 1 player.
name: Pagan
ability: If you die by execution, each night a player might become drunk tonight and tomorrow day or a player might die.
flavor: We do not beg them to do things for us, we ask to be empowered and to assist us, so that we may do these things ourselves.

firstNightReminder: The Poppet points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Poppet points to a character. If that character is in play, they are poisoned.
name: Poppet
ability: Each night, choose a character: if in play, they are poisoned tonight and tomorrow day.
flavor: I say a little prayer for you.

firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a not-in-play good character. Put the Boffin to sleep. Wake the Demon. Show the 'This Character Selected You' info token then the Boffin token, then the not-in-play good character token. Place this second character token by the Demon character token. Put the Demon to sleep.
name: Boffin
ability: The Demon (even if drunk or poisoned) has a not-in-play good character's ability. You both know which.

otherNightReminder: The Mind Flayer points to a player. That player dies. Show the Mind Flayer that player's character token. The Mind Flayer either nods their head yes or shakes their head no. If they nod their head yes: Move the 'Has ability' reminder to that player.
name: Mind Flayer
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If a living player dies this way, you learn their character & may choose to gain their ability. You may only have 1 additional ability at a time this way.
flavor: I'm sure if we bashed your head in, all sorts of secrets would come tumbling out...

firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.
